Home.heroSubtitle: End-to-end encrypted password manager that puts you in complete control of your digital security
Home.featuresDescription: Our password manager combines advanced security with ease of use
Home.feature1Description: Your data is encrypted before it leaves your device, ensuring only you have access to your sensitive information
Home.feature2Description: Access your passwords securely across all your devices with real-time synchronization
Home.feature3Description: We never see or store your master password, ensuring complete privacy and security
Home.howItWorksDescription: Get started with Secure Vault in just three simple steps
Home.step1Description: Sign up with your email and create a strong master password
Home.step2Description: Import existing passwords or add new ones to your secure vault
Home.step3Description: Securely access your passwords across all your devices
Home.ctaTitle: Ready to Secure Your Digital Life?
Home.ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who trust SecureVault with their digital security

Footer.footerDescription: SecureVault is your trusted partner in digital security, providing state-of-the-art password management with uncompromising privacy
